content.detailedDescription: The objects moved east to west at tree top level, appeared to slow than stop then descend past point of view (first two) i drove west on a side road for about a mile, and witnessed the last two come at me directly from the east and curve to the northwest and than vanish into a cloud bank. they appeared to be 200 to 500ft. there were no aircraft visible or audible in the sky at the time. the first sighting occurred at approximately 9.10pm, the second maybe 5 minutes latter. the third at9.28pm. and the fourth at 9.33pm. objects observed from two different vantage points, by three different people. i don't know what they were, but i am sure they were not aircraft or helicopters. no soundâ€¦this took place 2 miles to the north of oxford.
content.summary: 4 different reddish orange balls of light moving east to west

content.detailedDescription:
Sighting,not expected/not prepared/no cellphone-camera on me!!! man,never thought-it could happen to me !!!! earlier,in daytime i trimmed 3 large-tree-branches,+ other yard-work. later-10:30p.M. i went outside to see how much lighter the area would be, minus the branches. i gazed up to top of that tree -->that's when i saw this object-to my surprise!!!! 'it' floated over the corner of my property-lot (huntington dr.-hartford ln.) (1)'it' had a "steady-speed" /no sound, (2)height,about(arm extended-finger pointing out)from rt. shoulder to left-shoulder--count around 10-12 seconds,,,,(3)seemed like a yellowish flicker-candle light inside- balloon-style--almost a point at bottom; (4)but the outside was white-almost see-thru..... (5)it traveled almost a straight-line--then at distance-veered a bit to the right....Neighbors tree blocked its path! the size:arm extended: almost the size of basketball. the hair on my arms rose-up+chills; thoughts-running fast.... what the hell is-this thing,,???? (a balloon? a sphere? a helium-object? 1-of-those mini-delivery-helicopter--i saw on tv/magazine,,,,(but-no sound).?? was 'it' something-from selfridge air base(mt.Clemens,mi.)?? wait a minute,the base is off hall rd./20 mile rd--> we are n.Of 24 mile rd. so,could it still be from the air-base???? or,is 1 of neighbors pulling a joke...???? not-sure if i should tell my wife--/or anyone/,since she knows-i watch many ufo -shows on 'science+history 'channels...... she may think - i'm crazy !! this object i saw is frigging' unbelievable !! i know-that i saw this object.... & am very sane !-- but never even thought--it would happen to me! i am very,very curious to know--'what-it-was'!!! & if anyone else in neighborhood-had seen this object?? ?? i will 'carefully' -inquire w/my neighbors....This week.
**((do not know --how to email a sketch by computer,,!!))
content.summary: Steady-speed, flowed from n.E.-to-s.W. ; about 3 story-colonial house height,

content.detailedDescription: It was about 10:20pm in calgary alberta i went outside in my backyard for a smoke. i always look at the stars when i go for a smoke but was looking for the moon as we are having a super full moon when i realized my house was blocking it so i couldn't see it. i then turned to look at the big dipper when i noticed an extreamly large light moving in the sky. it felt like the wind stopped blowing and everything got quite. the light was moving closer to my position quickly when it slowed down when i saw at least two maybe more objects much smaller and somewhat red in colour but dull come off of it almost like it ejected them off. i managed to keep my eye on one it moved up but slightly south then hovered in one spot. i continued to watch the larger light as it came closer over top of me when it looked like the sky around it was moving almost like the sky was folding around it when it got directly over top of me i noticed around the light everything was darker almost like a black object that struck an extreamly large shadow in the sky surrounding this extreamly bright light after it passed me and moved strait east i heard this weird rumbling sound somewhat like a jet but quiter and deeper in sound almost scary. i have never heard anything like that before. as it slowed down again i got scared i felt like i was being threatened and it wanted me to look away. my heart stopped beating as it moved further east i had a sense of relief fly over me like i'm safe now and it's light became brighter for a split second as it flew away. i turned to see if that small object i saw position itself in the sky was still there and it was very dim and barly noticeable i was still scared so i went inside. i have seen strange objects in the sky before but nothing in my life has ever scared me like that and iv never seen space move around or appear to move around anything like that before. i have never seen a shadow cast on other stars or heard a noise like that in my life. it has made me feel uneasy and freaked out.  very unsettling. once it was far enough away the wind was back and so where the noises of the city. i saw a plane fly underneath it once it was further away as well. i felt like i should share this as i know it was real and i need others to know what i saw.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw a bright light in the sky noticed it moving going slow then speeding up at least two smaller objects ejected out of it then it continued over my head slowing down then slowly speeding up

content.detailedDescription: So i was in my bedroom playing poker on line. i stop to have a cigarette out my bedroom window. just as i open the window i seen this bright blue light to my left. like it had come over my house. at first i thought it was a airplane but then realized it made no sound what so ever. im used to hearing airplanes fly over my area and know the sound. this had no sound what so ever. so i ran and picked up my phone and started to record it.Then i noticed it had also red and white lights too. the blue light seem to be the brightest.It looked like the white light was flashing then i could see a red light too. whatever it was seem to moving slow but change course.I watched the object kinda go behind street lights then i couldn't see it after that.After i seen this i went online to try and find airplanes that had these lights on them.There is a lot of airplanes that have red and white lights.But none that i could find with blue and red and white lights,what sticks with me the most is that it made no sound. i seen airplanes higher in the sky than this object and i could hear the after burn from them.
content.summary: Having a cigarette out my bedroom window. when up to my left i seen this bright blue light.Also red and white lights. the blue light seem to be the brightest. white light seem to be flashing.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of the full moon on the beach. i did not notice anything at all at the time that i was taking the pictures as it was dark. i took my pictures with a samsung galaxy s5 using the flash. i noticed these pictures once i was inside reviewing them. pictures were taken between 8:38 pm to 8:59 pm
content.summary: Object observed in picture of full moon

content.detailedDescription:
1: i was letting my dog go to the bathroom 

2: nothing, i just looked that way and there it was

3: an airplane 

4: it slowly shot off in a straight line into the distance, high above the tree level tree

5: i was shocked... i didn't expect to see a ufo. i tried to convince my mother, but she was uncertain to beleive me..My father was very easy to convince.

6: i watched it until it dissapeared, i would say it lost sight of me
content.summary: Standing outside with my dog as i gazed into the dark sky, i saw a glowing, white orb, slowly shoot into the distance

content.detailedDescription:
It was night time around 10:40-45? i went outside to have a smoke before bed like i do every night. i live on the second story of my apartment building,i  just lean on the railing and stare at the stars and watch the planes go by. i noticed a plane to the left of me blinking and heard it, i kept looking around and in front of me i noticed another plane very far away with a tiny blinking light. i see these almost every night. as i was looking at the small plane i remember thinking to myself "man just another plane" right then what i thought was a shooting star catches my eye right above me but has i am trying to look something else catches my eye,across the street above the trees i can see five circles sort just pop in to sight,it stays there for a second, i think to myself no way and shake my head to make sure i wasn't seeing things or some sort of another plane but it was there. it was only there for about five seconds but i saw five very dim dark red-orange circle light in a triangle shape and the were big almost the size of one of the little planes that fly over my house, it made no sound that i could hear.I could sort of make out the shape but it was very dark,it almost looked like it was camouflaged in to the night sky.It started after just a second to move ne pretty fast and the back two circle moved in words slightly and then it just sort of faded away and i couldn't see it anymore.
i remember thinking oh my god what did i just see,i just saw a ufo! so i ran inside to tell my wife but she was sleeping and just told me to keep looking and draw a picture. after about two minutes i went back outside to look again but the only thing i saw was plane right above me flying right over my house very low headed north. i stayed out side for about ten more minute even going down to the parking lot to look but didn't see anything but the bright half moon and a bunch of stars.
content.summary: I saw a five large circled lights in the shape of a triangle.

content.detailedDescription: Aug. 9th , 2014 at 10:45 pm. in east naples, florida .It was a clear night. husband got home and parking the car as he walked out of his car he saw in the sky 2 very bright lights moving as if in a line but very separately from each other. there was no noise what so ever. he ran to our condo appartment on the second floor and told me to come out. the condo building only has two floors,  it was hovering above our condo building looked like a big star as big as a basketball with orange and yellow lights in the middle it seemed to get a little bigger and then it disappeared, the other other one also disapeared. we had never seen anything like it before  we just looked at each other but that was it.
content.summary: Bright moving lights and then hovering and took path east naples, florida

content.detailedDescription: Driving home at approximately 10:15 pm south on st. laurent blvd. noticed bright light in sky at approximately 30 degree angle. thought it was a plane. this was around belfast road. there were quite a few lights on it, more than a plane should have and it had a silver illumination on the body. as i drove closer to the light the perspective changed. i was seeing the bottom of it. between industrial avenue and the turn at russell road, i watched the underside of whatever it was. there were a number of round lights that kept altering their pattern and colour. the first pattern i noticed was a diamond shape. they became more circular and constantly changing shape and colour. it was hovering over the national museum of science and technology. i thought it might be some kind of art of science installation. i was stopped at a light to turn right where st. laurent meets russell road. my angle now was 55 or 60 degrees to view it. it was stationary, just continuously blinking different colours and shapes. i tried to snap a quick picture before the light changed but it did not turn out. i continued driving towards my home trying to reconcile what i saw. as i live only a few kilometers away, i went outside when i got home but saw nothing. i researched the museum's website and they had nothing on which described what i saw. i have driven the route the last two nights around 900 pm but saw nothing.
content.summary: Driving in car, noticed lights in sky straight ahead, observed ufo for approximately 3 minutes blinking lights

content.detailedDescription:
We were playing cards 11 pm july 25th, 2009 at our lake lot on moyie lake, 15 minutes south of cranbrook,bc,canada. out of the sky, decending down like ducks landing on a pond appeared 5 bright yellow-orange orbs.  they appeared like huge falling stars or meteors that were going to crash on top of us.(i thought it was armagedon)  the whole lake lit up bright. then they just stopped and hovered a couple hundred feet over the lake for 5-10 minutes.

initially they hovered about 500-1000 yards from our campsite.  after a couple minutes one of the orbs flew adjacent to our site, over the provincial park about tree top height and 100=300 feet from our trailer.  it was much less luminent than when coming out of the sky but still of average brightness.  it looked to be about 10 feet in diameter with a filament of light looking shape inside the orb like a incandecent light bulb. the orb stopped across from us,hovered for 30 seconds and dimmed down like you would dim lights in your dining room. as it started to move away to the ne it got bright again.  it then slowly moved away in the direction of kimberly.  a minute later, the second orb did exactly the same as the first, stopping, dimming and slowly moved off to catch the first one.  then two came together following then same procedure as the first two.  the final orb hovered over the lake while the others moved in single file away about 5 miles.   the final orb finally passed by our site but for a very short time.  he dimmed up and down quickly and then as fast as you can snap your fingers it was gone and quickly in line with the others.  i'd guess it traveled about 5 miles in around one second.

during the whole time watching this event none of us felt scared.  we talked about it after and it was more a feeling of aweness.  we initally were startled when they came out of the sky but as the orbs passed by our site we all felt calm.  this was the most extraordinary experience of my life.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Five orbs hover over lake for 5 minutes and then fly off in staight line formation like canada geese.

content.detailedDescription: At cemetery visiting a relative, noticed something hovering at an 80 degree angle. it was in the middle of a blue sky, no clouds or stars around right before dusk. thought it might be a plane but planes do not go up at that angle and there are no airports near by. appeared to elevate very slowly then moved horizontal and appeared to move away, within a couple minutes it was out of sight. we were dumfounded and amazed during and after the event. it flew out of sight even thought we  tried to follow it with car but it went out of sight.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Something hovering at an 80 degree angle looked like cloud, then became horizontal and flew away.

content.detailedDescription:
My children called out to me to check out a strange light in the night sky, passing by our home at some distance over the ocean. i saw a rather little and wobbling, rather slow moving light, heading in ne direction which is very unusual around here, as it also moved at a relatively low altitude. i managed to take just 1 picture as the light suddenly disappeared.

i was very surprised as i checked out the picture (zooming in), to see a kind of light track produced by the light due to the shutter speed of 0,8 sec, which also showed a circular, disc-shaped object, seemingly moving in a more or less erratic way, changing position all the way through.

hope this picture can shed some light on aero dynamical behavior of ufo's.

ps. f/5.6, iso 6400, fd 35 mm;
content.summary: It flew by at some distance (over the ocean) and i just managed to take one picture

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside by myself watching the stars and then there was a bright light like someone took my picture and i woke up this afternoon at 12:30 and i had once again these marks on my arms. on my left this time looks like almost a cross but a little different. on my right arm looks like a seahorse or something like it.I went to the va and showed them the other marks and they cannot explain them or how i got them.After last night i think people need to know what the hell is going on though i know you all cannot stop it but the goverment can as they know, i now believe.I will be happy now to talk to someone that know's more then i do about this as i am tired of these marks as they hurt like fire for awhile.I also hope you can find someone to verify my story about us all being taken to a lake and the ship changing shape as i will help them verify it also.
content.summary: A flash of bright light then nothing

content.detailedDescription: Well,i never believed in ufo's until 09/11/2001.The day the twin towers attacks happened.Note this a different event than the one i am reporting now.I will explain both first the one i am reporting now.This happened by china lake naval base.The night before the crash i was driving down the road when i notice a moving star.I pulled over to get a better look at this object.It made no sound and looked like burning magnesium.I watched the object fly from eastern sky to the western mountain range at about a thousand ft and after it passed above me it started to drop material like molten lava.Whatever it was made of was coming apart.Not just a little bit of it but a lot of it.This was shocking to me and my bother at the time.After telling my uncle he said he saw the same thing on the other side of town and he was looking at it through his telescope.Now it gets better i worked in bakersfield at the time and took hwy 178 everyday.The next morning on my way to work i notice on the hillside a half mile crash site that still exist today and i got plenty of pictures of it but never set foot on the site far of radiation poison.I never seen the crash itself but i know that what i saw the night before is what caused the markings on the hillside.Note i travel that road everyday for years.Now the following day after i noticed the crash site.I passing by it again i notice the burn site has gotten bigger and the same thing for the day after that and it only changed at night cause it was the same when i would come home each day but the next morning is when it was changed.The only answer i would have to this is china lake naval base was covering up this.They are the only that would and could perform this kind of cover up or i could be wrong and its radiation that's caused the hillside to burn more.Its for sure a crash site and why would someone try to cover it up secretly at night for four days this happened i would love to show people this crash site to answers.Now about two weeks later 10 miles away down the road there was another crash this time a whole mountain top of solid rock was on fire and it was in the same path line as the object that i seen two weeks prior. this time the fire department was there in full force.This fire was burning on a rock half mile long and wide. i did see anything happen there but it does not take a genius to figure out what happened there to make rock burn.Please contact me i would love to show someone these crash sites hopefully there is some evidence to gather.I will make my other report at a different time i not very good at typing as you can tell so i will wait for someone to type it for me thank you.
content.summary: The thing crashed into the ground and left a half mile burn mark exist still today

content.detailedDescription: I was watching fireworks at night at fort osborn barracks...Had 3other people with me ...Half way through the event it started raining really hard everyone ran to their cars..For unknown reason i stayed and looked up at the sky...That's when i saw this huge window like object just above the tree line...It looked like square windows of light about the size of a football field...The whole thing was lit up..At tree line i'd say about 30 to 40 feet high.When i looked around there was nobody else but i did see a girl run to a car behind mine and i heard her say did you see that ...Very excited....When i got back to my car my wife wanted to go home right away as her hair had gotten wet and she wanted to go home and dry it off....Forgot all about this thing till 20 or more years later......Now i wonder if anyone else report this event was it a mother ship did it land etc etc i knew it was a ufo of some kind ..I was very excited in seeing this thing it was my first sighting......
content.summary: Went to fort osborn to see fireworks..Parked on street close by. cloudless night bright and sunny all day half way through show rain came down heavy everybody ran to cars i looked up and saw ufo...Watched it forv5minutes or so ran back to car ...

content.detailedDescription: Recent every night. 3 orbs triangulary flaying,chnging direction .Hovering over city shining very bright withe -blue light.Direction south-north,or west-east. very much actvity recently .Like if something calling me to watch.Lots of sightnings thru the years.Some are triangulari shaped ,some big red sphere ,the gratest was over a mile big.Square flying with wider side front-incredible with collors like a rainbow.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 brighte sphere flying above city.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a tour in egypt in september of 2008. part of our tour was a southbound trip down the nile for three days on fellucas. we had two groups sailing on 2 large, flat-topped sail boats, each having two large sails. on the 23rd  (my birthday), the group decided to go ashore to a camel market onshore in the support boat - which is where we ate our meals, showered, etc. and followed our fellucas. we were anchored (approximately) across from an island called, "elephantine island", if you need to find it on a map.
i decided to stay behind on the felluca, so i could be by myself on the boat and relax in history and enjoy the trees and shrubs along the nile.
i was so relaxed, gazing off to the land south of me and suddenly i saw three fellucas, all horizontal beside the land, one in front of the other. (i wish i could draw a picture). usually , the boats are landed with the front of the boat on the land. these ones were side by side, horizontally, in front of the land, in a configuration like this:
                 
           ********************land***************************
                          boat
                            boat
                              boat
instead of being:

          ********************* land *************************
                      b          b             b
                      o          o             o
                      a          a             a
                      t          t             t

i remember thinking how unusual it was for the boats to be arranged like that. as i was watching (i wasn't thinking anything about ufos at the time), the masts suddenly turned into like a silver celluloid - it was light and reflected light at the same time. it seems like it knew that it had gotten my attention, but i was still just in observation mode. then, the sails seemed to melt from the top down, all at the same time until they were level with the boat. once they were all in order, they all merged into a cigar shape. it stayed in that shape for awhile, then it blinked out of existence. then it blinked back into existence. and it went in and out of existence about 4 or 5 times. then it just blinked out of existence. i remember thinking, "wow, that was wierd!", and i just kept gazing at the same spot where they had disappeared from. i didn't think anything about it, i just thought it was very strange. i realized about a couple of  hours later, that i had just seen a ufo shape-shifter and was trying to wrap my mind around that. 
i never told anyone on my tour about what i had seen - i was also just trying to digest what i had seen and just kept going over it and over it in my mind, so i would remember.
about 2 years after i had come home, i told one of my sisters who was nasty about it and didn't believe me and told me i was nuts. i haven't told very many people about it. but it was real and it was exciting, once i figured out what i had witnessed.
by the way, i don't drink or do drugs, so it wasn't some type of hallucination i was having. if you would like to speak with me about it, you have my permission. i have tried to post this story to your site many times, but my computer would just do weird things when i tried. hopefully, today, it will work.
thank you for all the awesome work that you do. i would like to join your organization as well.
content.summary: Please see detailed description

content.detailedDescription: Events has changed from day to day.Ive seen apparitions of holy mary.Ive seen insect like beings alter my mind and felt invaded.Ive seen them even alter,effect and change my current location like there following me.Ive seen reptile like beings but was rarely affected by them and didnt feel threatened.Ive seen ships and starlike ships in the skys like there watching me from there aswell.I feel like they have my soul on show and have altered and changed my moods and feelings from angry to sad,etc...They eventually dissapear especially when i have a visitor but they stay in my head.
content.summary: Keeps following me after my sighting in 1998 and has even altered the reality around me.

content.detailedDescription: Just happened looking out at night and late night been watching different directional other than common flying from and into denver international airport from golden table mountain areas and notices of different type unusual movements and colors, etc. i just keep looking at and not sure what to do.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Just happened looking out at night and late night been watching different directional other than common flying from and into denver international airport from golden table mountain areas

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: On july 1st 2014 me and wife along with our two sons (one 18 and other 12) were driving down to las vegas from our home up in british columbia and we stopped in jerome idaho and spent the night at the comfort inn & suites. just before getting to the hotel we stopped at a fireworks stand as we decided we would light some off later that night to celebrate the beginning of our summer vacation. we went outside at around 9:30 that night and walked around to the back of the hotel so i believe we would have been facing west and there is a big open field which was a perfect spot to light off the fireworks, the skies were mostly clear with the odd cloud. it was not totally dark yet so started by lighting off some of the smaller fireworks, about 5 minutes into this three orange orbs appeared up in the sky in front of us behind a thin cloud, all 3 were the same size and all at the same elevation and they hovered for about 20 seconds before disappearing, my youngest son grabbed my iphone and tried to get the orbs on video but he was to late. if you watch the first video i have attached called "ufo 1" you will see the conditions that night as well as hear my families reaction to what we had just seen, we knew it something strange and we were all stunned. we continued to light off the rest of the fireworks which were much larger and about a minute after we had finished the 3 orbs reappeared this time further to the south and this time not behind a cloud, my son grabbed my iphone again and started recording, again they were there for about 20 seconds and then they disappeared. he thought he had all of it on video this time but when went back and looked we were disappointed as only one of the orbs showed up in the video and only for about 2 seconds before disappearing. in the second video i attached called "ufo 2" you can briefly see the orb in the first two seconds of the video before vanishing, kind of tough to see but we put the video on our 52" tv and you can see in plain as day, also you can once again here my family's reaction. i also attached a 3rd video called "ufo 3", not much to see but you can still here us reacting to what we had just witnessed. people have mentioned flares or chinese lanterns but i don't believe for a second it was either one, i really believe me and my family witnessed something from out of this world.
content.summary: 3 orange orbs hovering for about 20 seconds then disapperaing only to return minutes later

content.detailedDescription:
Date: 21-july-2014
time: 19:47 (india time)
my location spot (as per google maps): 28.6515502,77.1641823
place: mcd park, block b, west patel nagar, new delhi, india
weather: very few clouds, with almost clear sky.
sunset (delhi time): 19:19 (india time) - the sky was still clear & bright blue (at 19:47).

i was waiting in the park, facing south-east-by-east, and happened to look up. there was a pink colored cloud to my left. i saw a glowing yellow circular object moving from my right to left. it perhaps had a black outline (circumference).

an airplane has blinking lights, which appear like dots and the body of the airplane can be easily seen.

whereas, this object, which was almost overhead, about 2 or 3 or 5 degrees away from the zenith (ovehead), was just a glowing yellow circle. it wasn't a beam. it was just glowing. if an airplane light is a dot of 1 mm, this object was about 8 mm to 10 mm in diameter. since it was almost overhead, i could only see its bottom side - glowing yellow, with perhaps a black outline (circumference). unlike an airplane, there was nothing beyond the glowing yellow light.

i could observe it for 2 to 3 seconds as it moved from my right to left - south-south-west to east-north-east. the left portion of my viewable sky had a pink colored cloud, covering about 30% to 40% of the viewable sky. it took between 2 and 3 seconds for it to move from right & top of the viewable sky and then went behind the pink colored sky. i tried hard to see any faint glow in the clouds, but couldn't see. normally an airplane light could have been seen in that portion where the could cover appeared thinner.

there was no noise, no smoke, no trail. i don't know what it was, but i have never seen any kind of such a yellow glowing disc moving in the sky earlier.
content.summary: Compared to an airplane light of 1mm dot, this object was about 8mm to 10mm glowing yellow circular bottom with perhaps black circumference.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were on our way home at 10:30 last night, aug.8, 2014. we live in the country and the stars on cloudless nights are visible. there are no city lights to cloud the night sky. we saw red/orange lights in the sky to the north east. we stopped our vehicle, turned off the motor and rolled down the windows. there wasn't any sound to indicate an aircraft, helicopter or any other known flying object that we would recognize. i tried to get a picture with my phone. by the time i got it up to the sky the lights just faded and disappeared. i never have seen anything in my 56 years that looked like what we saw. the two of us are still wondering if anyone else saw those lights last night.
content.summary: Two separate groups of 3 red/orange lights. hovered then slowly disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Sorry about the motion of the video, i seem to be all over the place.  i first noticed the object between the roofs of the bungalows while in my back garden and at first thought it was a plane with a chem-trail but i have seen many of these type of trails and this did not fit the description.  in the video i have sent, at about 20 secs into the video there is also a very small bright light that appears and disappears so quick that at first i failed to see it.  the object continued to travel west and as it got further away it just seem to disappear into the sky.  today 9/8/2014 i took a photo of a plane chem-trail from my back garden (in attachments)way high in the sky to compare with the object and there is no resemblance.  around the time of seeing the object a few months before i had a number of ufo experiences one involving white lights and a silver craft while standing in my garden at twilight time with my dog.  i had no time to run inside and fetch my camera to to take a photo as the silver craft was so quick.  over the years i have witnessed over 22 ufo objects, three of them were actual craft. 

ps in attachments is the video i took of the object and some still photos from the video are also included.
content.summary: White light with trail behind

content.detailedDescription: Was just getting ready for bed when my wife told me to look out of window at what she thought was a meteor, i thought different as the objects where in tandem one bright light closely followed by a smaller dimmer one also the objects where cruising across the sky not falling. the objects then disappeared into the distance. i believe these objects were going to fast to be a lantern or plane plus the dimmer one following was too close to be two planes chasing each other.
content.summary: One bright light followed by dimmer one which camera didn't pick up.

content.detailedDescription:
I often go outside to view the horizon on on-coming natural events or weather patterns, especially if i suspect the weather forecast is wrong, i like to look and observe and make my own judgement.
i was outside for around 10 minutes and then i noticed a small white light in the north direction of the sky, it seemed to just be hovering which i thought, "thats a little odd", i thought it maybe a plane or helicopter flying towards my direction so that is why it looked as if it was hovering.  but i then listened for any sound and at that time there was none apart from a light wind.  it seemed to just hover for around 5 minutes and as there was no sound i continued to observe yet my mind was starting to tell me, "am i actually witnessing something from the x-files"  my mind could not really comprihend it yet i continued to observe, fascinated but did not go to get a camera, one i did not think to as i did not want to miss this unique to my experiences phenomenom. 
the light orb which was glowing white then seemd to get bigger and move closer to my direction and it moved with a smoothness and control that i have never seen before but was awed by it.  it stopped midway between the clouds so i could not make out any outline only a round shimmering white light.  
then i noticed a red light come on but i was not blinking (like that of an airplane light)  it was also above the white light which was unusual and as i had never ever witnessed anything like this before it was hard for my mind to come to terms with it but it did as i am a very open-minded individual.
the object/orb then moved side to side rapidly as if it was monitoring something, then i observed it stoped and i could tell it was preparing something, i just felt an energy in the air, almost like static energy.  the orb then switched off the red light light and its white light started growing to around 4x its size and it suddenly shot up into the ne direction towards space, it shot off so fast after discharged the bright white light, it was a light explosion, a bright flash and it moved like nothing i have ever seen before.  i thought i hard a booming sound as it left my sight but as there was a thunder storm on the way i cannot be completely satisfied the sound came from the unknown flying object.  i never truly believed in ufo report or sightings as i have to have a persoanl experience to truly believe anything, "seeing is believing" as 'they say'.  i stayed outside for another 20 minutes but there was nothing apart from increasing stormy weather so i came back inside my own and the rest of the evening was trying to make sense of what i had witnessed.  after a couple of days it became very clear on what i had witnessed and now i must say i am some what a believer in this phenomenom, i never ever thought i would say that or even feel it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Saw ufo in my back garden when i went to observe a coming storm, hidden by slight cloud covering and it was getting dark

content.detailedDescription: Weird objects
content.summary: Over 30+ bullet like objects coming out the clouds

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Object above as if it intended to land at sierra vista high school, bp but police came and object composed itself back to normal flight path , flew up and towards lbc area...Police chased object in the sky out and away from its jurisdiction as if determined to catch it. object had two sparkling lights at each end almost flashing as a sparkler does but tumbled in the sky as a fair ride tumbles in the sky just that this object was not stationary, yet hovered .
content.summary: Flashing lights across at ends of mid aircraft, tumbling, twirling object

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside around 10.25 pm looking the moon.
looked towards long beach airport when i saw an object climbing.
it looked like a plane departed long beach airport, but it was way too fast.
the object made a noise like a jet plane but not very loud.
if it had been a fighter, the noise is much louder where i live.
it flew what looked like from south to north.
the object flew behind a tree so i expected it to show up on the other side.
it did not.
what struck me when i saw it was the speed. very fast.
content.summary: Looked like a plane taking of from lgb

content.detailedDescription: Was reading this article about what sometimes happens to clouds after a rocket is shot off to make them look so majestic blue. it was actually those beautiful clouds thst caught my attention and made me want to read article about how they were formed and what made them that great color. photographer took at cape cansveral florida area shortly after a rocket was launched from cape cansveral.  i noticed that there seem to be 2 ufo's in the picture also checking it out. i dont think the writer realized......
content.summary: Found this picture at space weather site and dont think the photographer noticed what they really got

content.detailedDescription:
To whom it may concern,
  i wanted to report a siting and ask about the possibilities of how i could test soil as we are curious.  in the late 70's my mother awoke to visit the restroom in the middle of the night in the top level of our home, she happened to look out the window to see a ufo in our backyard, on ben franklin road north in indiana, pa about 1.75 acres away near the woods line. it was a saucer type ship with lights around the rim and she saw small beings walking at the base of the ship in front of the lights. she was frighten and ran back to bed. she had the senses they may have sensed she was up so she bundled in her covers and faced away from the bedroom window and tried to empty her mind and feign sleep. she feared what 'they' would do if they sensed they knew she seen them. she heard loud clanging sounds and the ship passed slowly by her bedroom window, it paused at the window as if checking to see if she was up then sped off. she said it was as loud as a coal truck clanging down the road. it was so surreal she questioned if it really happened and felt strange saying anything to anyone. my bedroom was on the ground level. at about the same time period, i heard a cluster of footsteps run past my window from the backyard to the front. it sounded like there were maybe 7 of them spaced a few feet from one another and would be the size of kids 11 years old. we were the only kids on the street with the exception of another boy down the street. i wondered if my brothers were sleeping out in a tent in the backyard with friends but they did not so it was unexplained. the landing cite afterward had 3 circles where nothing would grow, today there are still 2 distinct areas with no growth. previous to that there was vegetation,  it was more sparse than the rest of the yard, but ground cover existed. i'm not sure if soil composition can change but there is a patch of red clay where we never recalled seeing before. i was home a few days ago and took a soil sample from the landing area and an area maybe 20 feet away and the earth is very different. the top of the rocks in the landing area, looks different than the bottom of the rocks. i'm wondering how i can check the magnetism or radiation of the area, if anything still resides or if i can find any trace left from so long ago. 
    i saw you have another report on your website from down he road during he same time period and yet another from nearby. 
    you are welcome to investigate the site. we talk freely about it and it would be nice to have validation.
     thank you for your time and consideration of our case.
sincerely,
[item moved/cms/nd]
content.summary: Landed ufo observed in backyard, beings witnessed in e light of ufo, then ufo took off loudly, pausing at bedroom window. multiple footsteps heard running outside along the house probable before siting.
